content: I wonder if mushrooms will grow in the damp conditions of the rainy season, moo? {A想象中}If I could make a hat out of mushrooms...

content: The Grasstop Grotto always reminds me of my old home. The roof is covered in wild grass, and it looks just like green woolen hat.
